Some of the classic details still remain: diamond shaped window panes, fir hardwood, arts & crafts fireplace surround, wall boards, front veranda, upper storey cedar gable ends & barrel brick walkway. There is also a separate cottage in the back with similar detailing and a new roof. The lot is 0.4 of an acre and is well kept and landscaped. Homes such as this are rarely available.
